skillTree.name: Cold One
skillTree.description: Dark, feral beasts indigenous to Lustria, tempted from their tropical jungles to bear the Lizardmen to battle.

skillTree.name: Carnosaur
skillTree.description: The ultimate jungle hunters, these large, apex predators have terrorised the primordial jungles since the dawn of existence.

skillTree.name: Obedience Brings Victory!
skillTree.description: Orders must be followed and the chain of command honoured; only then will the Great Plan be served.

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Honoured Elder
skillTree.description: Those Saurus not lost to war may live to a great age - their long service esteemed and respected by younger Lizardmen hungry for experience.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -5% for Saurus and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -5% for Temple Guards units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Saurus and Cold One units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Temple Guards units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Wargear of Xahutec
skillTree.description: Xahutec maybe fell but its riches still can be found by those that seek.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +2% for Blessed units when selecting banner
	(all armies)
Income from post-battle loot: +30% when selecting banner
Alignments used: -1 per turn when selecting banner

Missile resistance: +2% for Blessed units
	(all armies)

Missile resistance: +2% for Blessed units
	(all armies)

Missile resistance: +2% for Blessed units
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Chotec
skillTree.description: "Whilst one brother lives in darkness, the other, his double-twin, exists in light. Behold!"

effects.description:
Construction time: -1 for Province Capital/Settlement buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Quetzl
skillTree.description: "By your scales be you blessed by the divine protector."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Saurus Infantry and Temple Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessing of Tepok
skillTree.description: "Brother of Great Tlazcotl, Tepok of the Air shall always be honoured. Let it be done."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Huanchi
skillTree.description: "Cousin of darkness, Huanchi's priests too shall dwell in twilight."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Tlazcotl
skillTree.description: "The universe resides within his reflective eyes; embrace the coldness of blessed certainty."

skillTree.name: Blessing of Itzl
skillTree.description: "Creator-meld of the beast, Itzl be praised!"

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for Feral Cold Ones, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Salamander, Razordon Hunting Pack, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Carnosaur, Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Cold Ones, Ancient Salamander, Stegadon, Bastiladon, Carnosaur, Coatl, Troglodon and Dread Saurian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Apex Species
skillTree.description: Although the wailing and sight of the evil hordes would've struck terror into the hearts of mortal men, the Al Saurim were not at all afraid, they just slew anything that came near.

skillTree.name: The Hunter
skillTree.description: None will escape this Oldblood.

skillTree.description: Battle is purpose.

skillTree.description: The Saurus will protect.

skillTree.name: The Chieftain
skillTree.description: He leads by example and inspires greatness within his company.

skillTree.name: The Inquisitive
skillTree.description: An unusual trait for a Saurus, this Oldblood has learned the ways of war by studying his opponents and copying their tactics.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

Melee attack: +2 for Saurus units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection â€“ a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Arrogant
backgroundSkills.description: Self-important and opinionated, this one's hubris knows no end.

backgroundSkills.name: Humble
backgroundSkills.description: Self-effacing and unpresuming, he believes that we all have a part to play in the Great Plan, one way or another.

backgroundSkills.name: Pompous
backgroundSkills.description: "What are you even for? You're not part of the Great Plan, like all your kind."

backgroundSkills.name: Uncompromising
backgroundSkills.description: "The Plan is the Plan. We shall not deviate or retreat from its path."

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for all units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Perfect Spawn
backgroundSkills.description: Very rare spawn of self-healing Saurus.

ui_effects.description: âž• Restores 4 Hit Points per second
Units won't regenerate if cap was reached

backgroundSkills.name: Leader of His Kind
backgroundSkills.description: Saurus gather around him.

	(all units in army)

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Dino Rider
backgroundSkills.description: Spawned to lead giant monsters.

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master Survivor
backgroundSkills.description: Alone in the jungles of Lustria for many years he watches.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Skaven Bane
backgroundSkills.description: A living terror in the mind of his enemies.
